  • Method Details

    • deployToken

      public String deployToken(String url, String privateKey, String publicKey, String tokenName, String amount)
      Creates a Fungible Token.
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984").
      privateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the owner wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      publicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the owner wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      tokenName - Receives the Name of Token (e.g., "MyCoin").
      amount - Receives the Amount of the Token (maximum value is 9×10¹⁸).

      Returns:
      Return the ASSET-ID case every crypto-conditions of CREATE action are fulfilled in BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").

    • transferToken

      public String transferToken(String url, String senderPrivateKey, String senderPublicKey, String tokenID, String recipientPublicKey, Integer amount)
      Transfers a token in the BigChainDB Network.
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984")
      senderPrivateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      senderPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      tokenID - Receives the ASSET-ID from the token that wants to transfer to another wallet
         (e.g., "095ee8b3a8599fabe61a09c1c046df7b8af3cb4f70b815222daad132988bd67d").
      recipientPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the receiver wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "FNJPJdtuPQYsqHG6tuUjKjqv7SW84U4ipiyyLV2j6MEW").
      amount - Receives the number of tokens that will transfer.
      Returns:
      Return the TRANSFER-ID case every crypto-conditions are fulfilled in the transaction at BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").

    • deployNFT

      public String deployNFT(String url, String privateKey, String publicKey, String nonFungibleToken)
      Creates a non-fungible token in the BigChainDB Network.
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a BigChainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984").
      privateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the owner wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      publicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the owner wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      nonFungibleToken - Receives the Asset/Metadata Array of the non-fungible token in JSON format
         (e.g., "{\n" +
        " \"asset\":[{\n" +
          " \"name\":\"Meninas\",\n" +
          " \"author\":\"Diego Rodríguez de Silva y Velázquez\",\n" +
          " \"place\":\"Madrid\",\n" +
          " \"year\":\"1656\"}],\n" +
        " \"metadata\":[{\n" +
          " \"location\":\"Madrid\",\n" +
          " \"value_eur\":\"25000000€\",\n" +
          " \"value_btc\":\"2200\",\n" +
          " \"owner\":\"Agent Bob\"}]\n" +
        "}").
      Returns:
      Return the ASSET-ID case every crypto-conditions of CREATE action are fulfilled in BigChainDB Network *
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").

    • transferNFT

      public String transferNFT(String url, String senderPrivateKey, String senderPublicKey, String nftID, String transferMetadata, String recipientPublicKey)
      Transfers a non-fungible token in the BigChainDB Network.
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984").
      senderPrivateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      senderPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      nftID - Receives the ASSET-ID from the non-fungible token that wants to transfer to another wallet
         (e.g., "095ee8b3a8599fabe61a09c1c046df7b8af3cb4f70b815222daad132988bd67d").
      transferMetadata - Receives the Metadata Array about the transfer of the non-fungible token in JSON format
         (e.g., "{\"metadata\":[{\"new owner\":\"Agent Alice\",
               \"location\":\"Rio de Janeiro\",
               \"value_btc\":\"2100\",
               \"value_eur\":\"30000000€\"
           }]}").
      recipientPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the receiver wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "FNJPJdtuPQYsqHG6tuUjKjqv7SW84U4ipiyyLV2j6MEW").

      Returns:
      Return the TRANSFER-ID case every crypto-conditions are fulfilled in the transaction at BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").

    • mergeFungibleToken

      public String mergeFungibleToken(net.i2p.crypto.eddsa.EdDSAPrivateKey bobPrivateKey, net.i2p.crypto.eddsa.EdDSAPublicKey bobPublicKey, String assetID, ArrayList<String> listOfTransactions, ArrayList<Integer> listOfOutputIndexes, ArrayList<Long> listOfAmounts)
      Merges a list of opens OUTPUT from the same ASSET in a unique transaction.
      Parameters:
      bobPrivateKey - Receives a Base58 private key from the owner.
      bobPublicKey - Receives a Base58 public key from the owner.
      assetID - Receives the ID from the ASSET that will be merged.
      listOfTransactions - List of Transactions with open OUTPUT about the ASSET.
      listOfOutputIndexes - List of OUTPUT-INDEX from open OUTPUT in the transaction.
      listOfAmounts - List of Amounts about the open OUTPUT in the transaction.
      Returns:
      The TRANSACTION-ID that unified all the OUTPUTS, generating a single OUTPUT with the sum of the amounts.
